ValidationRule.description: Client Referral field is required when Lead Source field value equals Referral - Client,Current Client-Additional ID
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: And((NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name, 'System Administrator'))),(NOT(CONTAINS($User.Job_Name__c, 'Assistant'))), OR(ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Referral - Client"), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Current Client-Additional ID"), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Referral-Paychex Referral Network")),ISBLANK( Client_Referral__c ),OppSource__c <> 'ReferralMethods')
